pkgmetadata.longdescription: Zigzag Expanded Navigation Plots // Graphical tools for visualizing high-dimensional data with a path of pairs. Note that this requires 'graph' from Bioconductor. Furthermore, if you want to use dynamic graphics based on 'loon', you need to have R configured with Tcl/Tk support and you need to have 'loon' installed, for example, from https://github.com/waddella/loon.
